abstract: Ron Meyer has signed a new three-year contract, extending his reign as Universal’s president and chief operating officer through 2015 at least.
snippet: Ron Meyer has signed a new three-year contract, extending his reign as Universal’s president and chief operating officer through 2015 at least.
lead_paragraph: 3:37 p.m. | Updated Ending months of speculation in Hollywood over the future of Universal Studios, Comcast, which gained control of NBC Universal in January, will keep the studio’s top manager in place.

headline.main: Ron Meyer to Remain as Chief of Universal
